      An openflow switch connecting to the controller.

      Process written messages through the message listeners for the controller

      This mimics the behaviour of the IOFMessageListener.
      IListener.Command IOFMessageListener.receive(IOFSwitch sw, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage msg, FloodlightContext cntx)
      This is the method Floodlight uses to call listeners with OpenFlow messages
